home.title: Voxee — Learn languages by practicing with AI
home.subtitle: Live conversations, parallel stories, listening quizzes, and image descriptions — with AI feedback.
home.span: Start with free credits — try every exercise. No card required.

cards.title: Exercises That Really Work
cards.text: Interesting, original exercises help you improve speaking, listening, and vocabulary for everyday life.

cards.title: Powered by Advanced AI
cards.text: We use powerful, bleeding-edge AI for natural voices and smart help — like a tutor, anytime.

cards.title: Clear Feedback & Smart Hints
cards.text: Get quick corrections with simple explanations — plus hints that help you keep practicing.

bulletsByStep: Choose a scenario — or invent your own (say, a dragon flight).
Make it your own: set roles, goals, and extra instructions.
Instant corrections with clear explanations (in your language).

Parallel view: target language on top, translation on the bottom. Hide or reveal.
Ask by voice — get instant feedback.

Now answer by voice — get the same clear feedback.
Build vocabulary & connected speech — describe the picture.
Need ideas? Tap smart hints for details.

Quiz types: image choice, true/false, short answer.
Answer and get instant feedback — build listening comprehension fast.

items.title: Privacy:
items.text: Your recordings and corrections are visible only to you.

items.title: Payments:
items.text: Top-ups are handled by Apple and Google. No external links, no direct card forms.

items.title: Support:
items.text: In-app Help & Feedback or email voxee-support@evermintlabs.com.

items.a: Yes — you start with a free balance to try every exercise. No credit card required.
Purchases are processed by Apple and Google (in-app). We never collect your card details or send you to external websites.
Beginner through advanced — the content adapts to your level and goals.

items.q: Which languages can I learn now?
items.a: Currently, English only — Spanish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, and Vietnamese are coming soon.
Use in-app Help & Feedback or email us at voxee-support@evermintlabs.com.
